skins.shipDescription: I'm the lovely high school girl affiliated with Hololive, Natsuiro Matsuri!! I love singing and having all kinds of lively conversations with people, so make sure to keep your eyes on me!
skins.selfIntroduction: I'm Hololive's official cleaner, Natsuiro Matsuri! I'm on the cheer team, so let me handle all the cheering! And you can't slack off either, Commander!
skins.acquisition: I'm the lovely high school girl affiliated with Hololive, Natsuiro Matsuri!! I love singing and having all kinds of lively conversations with people, so make sure to keep your eyes on me!
skins.login: Good morning, Commander! Let's get hype! But don't get any funny ideas - I'm a pure Vtuber after all!
skins.details: Hey now! You should at least say sorry if you're gonna stare like that. I'm a girl, after all, mind your manners. Or at least tell me I'm pretty!
skins.secretaryIdle1: Just what are you looking at, Commander~ I guess I'm just that gorgeous, huh?
skins.secretaryIdle2: There's sooooo many cute girls in this world! I love it!
skins.secretaryIdle3: Commander! Hm? Are you doing an endurance stream too?
skins.secretaryIdle4: DD? Oh yeah~ I'm a DD, in all kinds of ways. Are you a DD, Commander?
skins.secretaryTouch: Sniff sniff... Sniff Sniff... Where the cute girls at...?
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Waaaahhh! Raising your hand against Matsuri is absolutely forbidden!
skins.secretaryHeadpat: Kitty ear mode: on. Don't they look soft?

skins.shipDescription: I'm the lovely high school girl, now in her extra-pure pajamas, Natsuiro Matsuri! Hey hey, Commander, what do you think? Surprised? Don't gawk at me too much~
skins.acquisition: I'm the lovely high school girl, now in her extra-pure pajamas, Natsuiro Matsuri! Hey hey, Commander, what do you think? Surprised? Don't gawk at me too much~
skins.login: Yaaaawn... Morning already? Gimme five more minutes... Uuunngg... I gotta sober up! I got a lot of great stuff to be pumped for today! Commander, you gotta perk up too!
skins.details: Feels nice and soft, huh? Hehee. You finally get how pretty I am, Commander? Here, I'll pose for you, so take a bunch of pictures~
skins.secretaryIdle1: I can't just stay in my room all day...? Fine, let's go! Huuh? I can't go out like this?
skins.secretaryIdle2: I wanna do a pajama party stream with everybody! That's like the best way to get close to people, right?
skins.secretaryIdle3: Commander, you're thinking I'm twice as cute as I was before, aren't you? Hehe, it just struck you, huh? No, you're seeing clearly~
skins.secretaryIdle4: Crunchy on the outside, soft on the inside, bite sized... Man, I love fried prawntheras~!
skins.secretaryHeadpat: Now I got animal ears just like Fubuki! How about it? Wanna give 'em a feel~?
